title: Himi 537
lyrics:
8.8.8.8.8.8.
1.
Kāinga, kīkītaki atu,
O’i pe nima mo e vaʻe,
Ko homou ‘aho ‘oku haʻu,
‘A e ‘aho homou veteange:
He kuo ofi ‘a e fonua
Kuo teuteu ‘e hotau ‘Otua.
2.
‘E ‘ikai fai ‘o ta’engata
‘A si’otau fononga ni;
Neongo e teʻeki hā
‘A e potu ‘oku fai ki ai:
He kuo tala he ‘Otua
Kuo Ne teuteu ha fonua.
3.
Moʻoni kuo fuoloa
‘A ‘etau ‘alu he toafa:
Ka ko e fē ‘a e tala’ofa
Ke hu ki he mālōlō ‘anga?
‘A ‘oua na’a tau lāunga
Kuo ofi eni ‘a e fonua.
4.
‘Oiseuke, ‘a e fe’aveaki?
Fai ki lulunga mo hahake.
Ka ko Sikaina ‘oku taki,
‘Oku tau kei ‘i hala pē.
Tau hanga atu pē ki mu’a,
Kuo ofi pē hotau fonua.*
